member.name: T:GolfConnector.Web.RSAKeyUtils.RSAParametersWithPrivate
member.summary: Util class to allow restoring RSA parameters from JSON as the normal RSA parameters class won't restore private key info.

member.name: M:GolfConnector.Web.Controllers.AuthController.ConfirmEmail(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Check if currently authenticated. Will throw an exception of some sort which shoudl be caught by a general exception handler and returned to the user as a 401, if not authenticated. Will return a fresh token if the user is authenticated, which will reset the expiry.

member.name: M:GolfConnector.Web.Controllers.AuthController.Post(GolfConnector.Web.Dtos.LoginViewModel)
member.summary: Login: Request a new token for a given username/password pair.

member.summary: Creates an to be thrown by the api.
member.param: Explanation text, also added to the body.
